Verses: 1 isravel Puththirar Kadandhu Theerumalavum, Karththar Yordhaanin Thanneerai Avargalukku Munbaaga Vatrippogappanninadhai, Yordhaanukku Melkaraiyil Kudiyirundha Emoriyarin Sagala Raajaakkalum Kettadhumudhalkondu, Avargal Irudhayam Karaindhu, Isravel Puththirarukku Munbaaga Sorndhuponaargal.
2 akkaalaththile Karththar Yosuvaavai Nokki: Nee Karukkaana Kaththigalai Undaakki, Thirumba Irandaamvisai Isravel Puththirarai Viruththasedhanampannu Endraar.
3 appozhudhu Yosuvaa Karukkaana Kaththigalai Undaakki, Isravel Puththirarai Aarlodh Mettile Viruththasedhanampanninaan.

4 yosuvaa Ippadi Viruththasedhanampannina Mugaandharam Ennavendraal: Egipdhilirundhu Purappatta Sagala Aanmakkalaagiya Yuththapurushar Ellaarum Egipdhilirundhu Purappattapinbu, Vazhiyil Vanaandharaththile Maanduponaargal.

5 egipthilirundhu Purappatta Ellaa Janangalum Viruththasedhanampannappattirundhaargal; Avargal Egipthilirundhu Purappattapinbu, Vazhiyil Vanaandharaththile Pirandha Sagala Janangalum Viruththasedhanampannappadaadhirundhaargal.

6 karththarudaiya Saththaththirku Keezhppadiyaamalpona Egipthilirundhu Purappatta Yuththa Purusharaana Yaavarum Maalumattum, Isravel Puththirar Naarpadhu Varusham Vanaandharaththil Nadandhu Thirindhaargal; Karththar Engalukku Kodukkumbadi Avargal Pidhaakkalukku Aanaiyitta Paalum Thenum Odugira Dhesaththai Avargal Kaanbadhillai Endru Karththaravargalukku Aanaiyittirundhaar.

7 avargalukku Badhilaaga Avar Ezhumbappannina Avargal Pillaigalai Yosuvaa Viruththasedhanampanninaan; Vazhiyile Avargalai Viruththasedhanampannaadhadhinaal Avargal Viruththasedhanam Illaadhirundhaargal.
8 janangalellaarum Viruththasedhanampannappattu Theerndhapinbu, Avargal Gunamaagumattum Thangal Thangal Idaththile Paalayaththil Thariththirundhaargal.
9 karththar Yosuvaavai Nokki: Indru Egipthin Nindhaiyai Ungalmel Iraadhabadikku Purattippotten Endraar; Adhanaal Andha Sthalam Innaalvaraikkum Gilkaal Ennappadugiradhu.
10 isravel Puththirar Gilkaalile Paalayamirangiyirundhu, Maadhaththin Padhinaalaam Thedhi Andhineraththile Erigovin Samanaana Veligalile Paskaavai Aasariththaargal.
11 paskaavin Marunaalaagiya Andraiyadhinam Avargal Dhesaththinudaiya Dhaaniyaththaalaagiya Pulippillaadha Appangalaiyum Sutta Kadhirgalaiyum Pusiththaargal.

12 avargal Dhesaththin Dhaaniyaththile Pusiththa Marunaalile Mannaa Peyyaamal Ozhindhadhu; Adhumudhal Isravel Puththirarukku Mannaa Illaamalpoi, Avargal Kaanaan Dhesaththu Palanai Andha Varushaththildhaane Pusiththaargal.

13 pinnum Yosuvaa Erigovin Veliyilirundhu Than Kangalai Ereduththu Paarkkumbodhu, Idho, Oruvar Avanukku Edhire Nindraar; Uruvina Pattayam Avar Kaiyilirundhadhu; Yosuvaa Avaridaththil Poi: Neer Engalai Serndhavaro, Engal Saththurukkalai Serndhavaro Endru Kettaan.

14 adharku Avar: Alla, Naan Karththarudaiya Senaiyin Adhibadhiyaai Ippozhudhu Vandhen Endraar; Appozhudhu Yosuvaa Tharaiyile Muganguppuravizhundhu Panindhukondu, Avarai Nokki: En Aandavar Thamadhu Adiyenukku Sollugiradhu Ennavendru Kettaan.
15 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Senaiyin Adhibadhi Yosuvaavai Nokki: Un Kaalgalilirukkira Paadharatchaigalai Kazhatrippodu, Nee Nirkira Idam Parisuththamaanadhu Endraar; Yosuvaa Appadiye Seydhaan.
